Windlord/Termitron/Nightlight::

Windlord carried Nightlight where cr's were and glenty deposited her 
in one. He closed the door and moved where Aerotaur and Gramps were.

***********

Termitron::

Termitron deposited glenty Trinity in Technosis's arms.
"Queen want's that her friend takes care of Little-Kitty-bot; "said 
Termitron" Old-bot is trying to kill the Queen !!!!" yelled 
angered "Termitron will kill Old-bot if he try to hurt her!!!! 
Termitron is going to go where Queen is in order to protect her"

After he says that Termitron leave the room.
